channel.title: Training on Sciathlon
channel.description: Recent content in Training on Sciathlon

item.title: Elevation gain run data analysis
item.description: Hey everyone! This article is part 2 (see part 1) of last week’s piece about analysing my running data from strava, and this time it is about my elevation gain data. Again, I am using the rStrava package. If you’re wondering why I have additional data from last week’s article, it’s because I had a bunch of runs on “private”, so I just unprivated most of them so I have more complete data.
